org.apache.twill.api
Interface TwillRunnerService

All Superinterfaces:
com.google.common.util.concurrent.Service, TwillRunner
All Known Implementing Classes:
YarnTwillRunnerService
public interface TwillRunnerService
extends TwillRunner, com.google.common.util.concurrent.Service

A TwillRunner that extends Service to provide lifecycle management functions. The Service.start() method needs to be called before calling any other method of this interface. When done with this service, call Service.stop() to release any resources that it holds.
